fields.name: Branch
fields.description: The git repository branch name to checkout.

fields.name: Commit
fields.description: The commit SHA to checkout. This value must be combined with the branch name to be valid. This takes precedence over semver.

fields.name: Semver
fields.description: The semver range used to match against git repository tags. This takes precedence over tag.

fields.name: Tag
fields.description: The git repository tag name to checkout. This takes precedence over branch.
